short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Makes YouTube stream H.264 videos instead of VP8/VP9 videos
short.cs: Přiměje YouTube ke streamování videa H.264 místo VP8/VP9

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube H264ify is a Chrome extension that makes your YouTube video playback smoother! 🎬

🔹 By default, YouTube streams videos in VP8/VP9 encoding, which can cause high CPU usage, stuttering, or even make your device overheat. H264ify helps switch the video stream to the more commonly hardware-accelerated H.264, resulting in smoother playback, reduced CPU usage, and extended battery life. 📈

💡 Features:

Automatically switches YouTube video streams to H.264 to reduce CPU usage
Enhances video playback smoothness and minimizes stuttering
Lowers battery consumption on laptops and mobile devices
Experience a smoother YouTube journey with YouTube H264ify! 🚀

——————————————————
YouTube H264ify 是一款可以让您的 YouTube 视频播放更加流畅的插件！🎬

🔹默认情况下，YouTube 会以 VP8/VP9 编码播放视频，这可能会导致某些电脑的 CPU 占用率过高、卡顿、甚至让设备过热。H264ify 可以帮助您将视频流切换为更常见的 H.264 编码，从而实现硬件加速，让视频播放更加顺畅，降低 CPU 占用率，并延长电池续航时间。📈

💡 特点：

自动将 YouTube 视频流切换为 H.264 编码，减少 CPU 使用
提升视频播放流畅度，减少卡顿
降低笔记本和移动设备的电池消耗
让您的 YouTube 体验更加丝滑流畅，立即安装 YouTube H264ify！🚀
